actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To clarify the temporary suspension of duty on 9, 10-Anthracenedione.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the heading of a specified chemical to provide for the temporary suspension of duty, through December 31, 2009, on 9,10-Anthraquinone, 2-t-amyl (CAS No. 32588-54-8) and 9,10-Anthraquinone, 2-iso-amyl (CAS No. 68892-28-4). Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation (refund of duties) on such chemicals that entered into the United States after December 31, 2006, and before the 15th day after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: To clarify the temporary suspension of duty on 9, 10-Anthracenedione.
